About.p1: I'm Abdullah. I was born in Germany and grew up in Turkey. For a period, I was interested in Islamic sciences; today my focus is on software.
About.p2: I am advancing in full-stack development and fully transitioning into the JavaScript ecosystem. I work with React, Next.js, TypeScript and Node.js. Clean code, sustainable structure and clear architecture are principles I carefully prioritize in every project.
About.p3: Software is not a profession for me; it is the way I turn what I imagine into reality. I write code to learn, create and leave a mark.
About.p4: Continuous improvement is not a goal for me, but a habit. One day I simplify API architecture, the next day I try a new UI framework. I am disciplined yet flexible, curious yet selective. I enjoy producing on my own as well as collaborating with a team that shares the same vision.
About.p5: My aim is not only to be a good developer, but to create lasting value that matters.
